LanguageData.DetonatorTable_detonate_desc: Detonates all armed remote explosives on the same channel in range.
LanguageData.RemoteExplosive_arm_desc: When armed, this explosive can be remotely detonated.
LanguageData.RemoteExplosive_detonatorChannelChanger_: Sets the detonation channel. Only explosives on the same channel can be detonated.
LanguageData.RemoteExplosive_autoReplace_desc: If enabled, this building will be automatically re-placed after being destroyed.
LanguageData.DetonatorTable_component_desc: Install a component to allow detonating explosives on different channels.
LanguageData.BillsTab_MaterialButton_tooltip: Sets the base material that new bills are created with.
LanguageData.FoamWall_smoothAction_desc: Smooth this wall to make it more presentable and usable as an interior wall.
LanguageData.PortableDetonator_detonateChannel_desc: Detonates all armed explosives in range on the current channel or on channel 1 if not upgraded.
LanguageData.PortableDetonator_broke_msg: The Portable Detonator ran out of battery power.
LanguageData.Detonator_notargets: Cannot detonate- no armed explosives in range on this channel.
LanguageData.DetonatorManual_detonate_desc: Detonates all explosives connected to the same detonator wire.
LanguageData.Wire_dry_desc: Calls a colonist to dry this wire section to prevent failures when it is used.
LanguageData.Alert_wireFailure_desc: A detonator wire failed due to being wet and burned out.
LanguageData.WireDesignator_desc: Selects only Detonator Wire placed in an area. Useful for maintenance and deconstruction. Hold Shift to add to current selection.
LanguageData.Setting_forbidReplaced_desc: When enabled, automatically placed blueprints will stay forbidden for a given number of seconds to keep colonists out of danger.
LanguageData.Setting_forbidTimeout_desc: How long an auto-replaced blueprint should stay forbidden (in seconds).
LanguageData.Setting_autoArmCombat_desc: When enabled, combat explosives will be automatically armed when they are deployed.
LanguageData.Setting_autoArmMining_desc: When enabled, mining explosives will be automatically armed when they are deployed.
LanguageData.Setting_autoArmUtility_desc: When enabled, utility explosives will be automatically armed when they are deployed.
